Sentece: Absorption of the drug was slow (tmax = 2 to 4 h), the mean half-life was 8.35 h, and the amount of the drug recovered in urine within 48 h ranged from 0.6 to 7.4% of the administered dose.
Title: Pharmacokinetics of diphemanil methylsulphate in healthy subjects.
Name: Diphemanil Methylsulfate

Title: Pharmacokinetics of diphemanil methylsulphate in healthy subjects.

Title: Pharmacokinetics of diphemanil methylsulphate in infants.
Name: Diphemanil Methylsulfate

Sentece: Half-life was 8.6 +/- 2.4 hours and tended to decrease with age.
Title: [Pharmacokinetics of diphemanil methylsulfate in infants].
Name: Diphemanil Methylsulfate

Sentece: The peak plasma concentration occurred in the sixth younger infant at 2.9 hours, with a half-life of 17.2 hours.
Title: [Pharmacokinetics of diphemanil methylsulfate in infants].
Name: Diphemanil Methylsulfate
